system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Jovian-Pattern Gun Servitor
Apt: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
system.descriptionText:
Order can only be made to Servitor Comrades with Weapons capable of Single-Shot fire. Servitor Comrade in Comms Rnage makes Standard Ranged Attack against target within range of its integrated Heavy Weapon.
Attack Orders have Attack Action Subtype, counts as Player's Attack for the turn.

description.value: Order can only be made to Servitor Comrades with Weapons capable of Single-Shot fire.
